website_summaries.verdict: Cleans your produce effectively without leaving any residue or odor on it.
pros: Can be added to a bowl of water to rinse many fruits and vegetables at one time
Reasonable price per ounce of product
cons: Might be more effective for washing 1 piece of produce if it was a spray

customer_reviews.title: excellent fruit and veggie wash
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years as it is the best I have tried. It foams well and rinses very clean, very quickly. I use it on fruit, veggies, hand washing dishes and to clean my eyeglasses. It leaves no film. when my grocery store stopped carrying it, I found it on Amazon and order it by the case. I pour it into spray bottles and keep in the bathrooms and the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A.

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Easy to rinse.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this once at a health food store and had to order more on amazon. Easy to rinse off my fruits and veggies. Light formula. Amazing price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Awesome price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! We have tried various produce washes over the years, the one the rhymes with sit, a couple from the Asian markets, and another brand we bought online. Hands down the Purely Essentials works the best of all we have used. 2 capfuls in the in salad spinner washes 2 heads of romaine lettuce, 2 lbs of strawberries, 2lbs of grapes, and 3 apples. (I ran out of produce to test in 1 session). The price per bottle is great. Buy this product, you will not regret it. Besides that it is formulated from natural ingredients not a bunch of chemicals most folks cannot pronounce.
customer_reviews.author: Barnesetti

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! I’ve been using this for years.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I feel it does a great job of removing waxes and coating from fruits and veggies. It is delicate enough on berries that I can wash and then store them without them withering. Also, it is easily rinsed off. I’m only able to buy it in a six pack but I usually share the cost with friends or give some away so I can share love:)
customer_reviews.author: Nicole E. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: I’m glad Amazon carries this
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for years to wash my fruits and vegetables. I don’t feel that water is enough There has never been a soapy residue. I don’t ever plan to stop using this.
customer_reviews.author: Luckymommy

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product.. works great on what it’s supposed to do.. I also use it to wash my vacuum seal bags and ziplock freezer bags, takes the smell of fish, chicken, onions or whatever else was in the bag!! I’ve tried other products and theres no comparison!! Love this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Soapy Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: It seems that this fruit and veggie was does clean the produce, but is a lot soapier than other brands I have used in the past. I am not planning on buying this product again unless there is a formula change to make it less soapy. It would be helpful if the product had a plastic top similar to a Windex bottle to clean the fruit instead of the current top of the bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Misha Beatty

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product because my husband won't use anything else to clean fruits and vegetables. Does a nice job and hopefully makes eating them safer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleans veggies and fruit well.
customer_reviews.text: The Environne Purely Essential Fruit and Vegetable Wash arrived safely, smoothly and as scheduled. I have been using this brand for a few years now and my in law even ask me to this for her because it truly washes the dirts out of the veggies well. And she doesn't like anything I get her .. lol except for this ... so that says alot. This is a 5 stars product and I highly recommend it. We purchased this product at full price.
customer_reviews.author: PDUBSNY

customer_reviews.title: Best Veggie Wash There Is
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for years. Found it at my local health food store. I went back to get it recently and they didn't have it. I was so happy to not only find it online, but at a big savings. It is all natural and its slightly slick texture is perfect to rub off whatever icks have touched your produce under running water for the required 20 seconds. I pour a few drops in a giant bowl to soak berries and lettuce, then rinse, dry and put away. No taste and each bottle lasts for months.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary B

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product for people who want to ensure their produce is bug free
customer_reviews.text: We keep Kosher and must ensure all of our produce is bug free. Purely Essential works great for this. The produce cleans up easily and Purely Essential leaves no residual taste.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Magid

customer_reviews.title: A must for produce and fruit
customer_reviews.text: This is the best fruit and vegetable wash available. It works extremely well, rinses off cleanly with no remaining residue or taste, and really makes yuo feel like your washing off waxes, dirt, and pesticides.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this to clean my veggies and fruit for a couple of months now. I am AMAZED by all the wax and dirt and whatever other stuff this product takes off fresh produce. The fruit looks better and tastes better after being washed in this.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy B.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: The wax and dirt just melts off. Bennett using for years and haven't found anything even close to as good
customer_reviews.author: wedge

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully!
customer_reviews.text: When I wash broccoli or grapes or whatever this soap leaves a pile of dirt on the bottom of the bowl. It also really perks up/crisps the veggies and makes them last longer in the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: OPCgirl

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product. Works well too! No after taste and no residue once rinsed off your fruit or vegetable.
customer_reviews.author: Rohini K Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fruit and veggies are SO MUCH CLEANER and brighter!
customer_reviews.text: Used this years ago and SO disappointed when store stopped carrying it. Only use a little at a time. Lots of suds. Can really see the film and dirt come off. Absolutely flavorless.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Taggert

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: Used for several years and effectively takes dirt and coatings off fruit and veggies. I buy all organic though.
customer_reviews.author: Practical Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love this wash
customer_reviews.text: This wash has no after taste. It is the best I've had. Unfortunately it is a little hard to wash. It cleans very well. It even gets rid of a waxy texture.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I used almost 10 years and it is needed especially if you have kids..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Efficiently makes the fruit and vegetables cleaner and more tasty
customer_reviews.author: Clifford Hymowitz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best fruit & vegetable cleaner that I have ever found.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: My fruit and veggies are so nice and clean! I had to switch brands due to my old product no longer being offered on Amazon (and I hate going to the store to find stuff). I stumbled upon this fruit wash and I absolutely love it. I will be purchasing it again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: C. Call

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product - A Little Goes a Long Way!
customer_reviews.text: I've used various brands of fruit/veggie wash and this one is by far the best. I eat a huge salad with varieties of 10+ veggies every evening. I was going through comparable brands like crazy. With Environne, you literally only need a few drops when washing a batch of greens or anything else. A little goes a long way. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Cat Mom

customer_reviews.title: Cleans easily and doesn’t leave a taste behind.
customer_reviews.text: This fruit and vegitable wash is excellent! I’ve usrd it for years. It’s easy to clean with and most importantly rinse out. I’ll be buying more when we run out.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Removes Dirt and Wax
customer_reviews.text: I love fresh organic fruit and vegetables, and spend the summer months shopping at local farmer's markets. I smell what they fertilize with, so I want to wash the produce to be sure my family stays healthy. This product removes the dirt and rinses away completely, leaving no flavor to ruin the natural taste.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Ippolito

customer_reviews.title: BEST PRODUCE CLEANING ITEM EVER
customer_reviews.text: BEST PRODUCE CLEANING ITEM EVER. It cleanes well with absolutely no residual smell. As a matter of fact there isn’t even a smell when you are cleaning your produce. This had recently changed its product name/distribution process, but I was able to find the old product that I know and love and compare it to this, they are the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Rockinjenn

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: This works well to clean fruits and vegetables. I am very happy!
customer_reviews.author: hokie fan

customer_reviews.title: Works well all natural
customer_reviews.text: I didnt need all the bottles. Wish they sold single ones. But i do love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Butterflyin

customer_reviews.title: Like this better than Veggie Wash
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the smell of Veggie Wash, so I got this one. It has less smell, and it is sudsy. Easy to use and not after taste.
customer_reviews.author: Beach Biker

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Takes the foggy film off of my fruits and should last a long time
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but worth it
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey, but much better product than the stuff in the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Snow

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite veggie-fruit cleaner. No residue left behind and the produce seems much cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: J Anon.

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: It does a good job cleaning produce, but foams up too much and is hard to rinse off completely.
customer_reviews.author: Duke Blue Devil

customer_reviews.title: Exclent Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. It does a great job cleaning the fruit and vegetables.Wouldn't go without it.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: A must!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! I've tried others but this is the BEST on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Best produce wash I have ever used. Leaves no residue.
customer_reviews.author: kojak

customer_reviews.title: I Believe It's the Best...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for years. I've tried many brands in the past but I think this one's the best. I trust the company and the product. It does a great job and rinses clean so the real taste of the product remains. Tips: I bought the large spray bottle and refill it with this 6-pack. After a certain length of time, I replace the spray bottle with a new one. I also spray the product on my hands before handling food. That way I don't have any residue on my hands from regular soap.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Jenett

customer_reviews.title: Use a small amount, a good cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Environne fruit and veggie wash works well to wash my fruits and veggies. I use a small amount to rub over the skin of the fruit/veggie and then rinse in 30 seconds. I can also add some of the wash to water and soak my fruits and veggies clean. I love this wash as it lasts a long time. We eat a lot of fruits and veggies.
customer_reviews.author: Princess Fireworks

product_meta.title: Environne Purely Essential Fruit & Vegetable Wash, None, 16 Fl Oz (Pack of 6)
product_meta.description: Removes nearly 400% more pesticides, waxes, and chemicals than water alone. Rinses clean, leaving behind no after-taste or sticky residues. The longest and most effective produce wash on the market. Apply a few drops directly to produce, massage for 30 seconds, and rinse thoroughly with water. For bulk washing, pour a few drops into a bowl of water, swish produce, and rinse.
feature_bullets: Removes more surface pesticides than water alone
Rinses clean, no aftertaste or residue

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
